name: Polyshooter (gameslee)
description:
Polyshooter

Shoot everything in this game as you try to stay alive! In Polyshooter, you battle against waves of enemies as you follow the neon track to the goal. Collect powerups, defend yourself against missiles, and try to reach the end of the track while destroying as many enemies as possible!

Controls: Use the mouse to control the camera. Hold down left click to fire.

For convenience, the scoring table for enemies is shown below:

EnemyScoreBomb500Boat1300Plane1500Missile Plane2000Balloon3500
